org.roug.osnine

Class MemorySegment

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.roug.osnine.MemorySegment
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Acia6551, Acia6850, Console, HWClock, IRQBeat, MemoryRemap, PIA6821, RandomAccessMemory, ReadOnlyMemory, VirtualDisk

    public abstract class MemorySegment
extends Object
    Abstract class for any type of memory - ROM, RAM or device.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MemorySegment(int startAddress)
      Create memory segment and set the end address to the start address.
      MemorySegment(int startAddress, int endAddress)
      Create memory segment from start address to end address.

                  int val)
        Write a byte to memory. If there is no memory, ignore.
        Parameters:
        addr - the memory address to write to.
        val - value to write.

      • forceWrite

        public void forceWrite(int addr,
                       int val)
        Forcefully write a byte to memory. If there is no memory, ignore.
        Parameters:
        addr - the memory address to write to.
        val - value to write.
